original: intros u l Hlim. unfold is_LimSup_seq. intros eps. destruct l as [l0| |]. - destruct (Hlim eps) as [N [HN1 HN2]]. split. + intros n. exists N. destruct (HN1 n) as [n' [Hn' Hn'']]. split. * apply le_trans with N; auto. * apply Rlt_trans with (l0 - eps); auto. + exists N. intro n. destruct (HN2 n) as [Hn1 Hn2]. apply Hn2. apply le_refl. - destruct (ex_lim_seq u) as [l H]. apply is_LimSup_seq_ext_loc with u l. + apply eventually_eq_filterlim with u (eventually_filterlocally (ex_intro _ l H)). + apply H. - destruct (ex_lim_seq u) as [l H]. exists 0%nat. intros n. simpl. split; auto.
